title: Emerald and Diamond Vanki Bangles - Vasundhara Collection
features: Modern adaptation of the traditional Vanki design. Features a row of oval-cut emeralds alternating with clusters of round brilliant-cut diamonds. The bangle boasts an exceptional Hyderabadi polish, giving it a rich, lustrous finish. Hinged opening for ease of wear and secure closure.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
or as a sophisticated statement piece for evening wear. Suitable for both traditional Telugu functions and contemporary events.
description: These bangles combine timeless elegance with contemporary design. The vibrant emeralds and sparkling diamonds create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring lasting quality and enduring value. The Vanki design carries cultural significance, representing prosperity and good fortune.
